Publish

  • ../1-Setup
  • ../2-Connecting/
  • ../3-Publish/
  • ../4-Subscribe/
  • ../5-Events/
Publish is to send a message that the server will dispatch to everyone interested in it.

PreConditions

  1. A connection has been made and bound to the variable "ws". Connection Example

Code

  1. var helloworld = {Message:'Hello World! (in realtime)'};
ws.trigger("MyFirstMessage", helloworld);
